name: Boltmon
effect: ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)[When Digivolving] ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ 1 of your opponent's Digimon. (Trash 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards.)
